desc: Free delivery for orders over £40! The perfect place for beer lovers, real ale fans and beer newbies alike to buy craft beer online. Visit our Fantastic range of award winning IPA's, Pale Ales, Lagers, Porters, Low Alcohol, Sours, Barrel Aged and beer merchandise, with Beer Gift Vouchers and brewery tour vouchers

layout.text: Brewing with Integrity and without Compromise since 2005.
The home of Jaipur and great craft beer
